traits.name: Climbing
entries: The gladiator can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Steadfast
entries: The gladiator can't be disarmed, and cannot make ranged attacks.

traits.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The gladiator makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield Bash
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d4 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
